metadata.name: TECHNOLOGY KILLS #2
metadata.description:
Creativity once flowed like a river,
But now it struggles to deliver.
For technology has taken hold,
And left our imaginations cold.

The screen, a captivating foe,
Has stunted what we used to know.
Our thoughts and feelings now suppressed,
As our devices keep us obsessed.

We need to break this digital chain,
And let our minds roam free again.
For only then can we reclaim,
The creativity that we once proclaimed.

So put down that phone, switch off that screen,
And let your creative spirit be seen.
For in this world, we must strive,
To keep imagination alive.
